sentences.sentence: Xiaohe rock body is a "I-type" high-plutonic rock body.
sentences.translation: 小河岩体是一个“I”型高位深成岩体。

sentences.sentence: Plutonic igneous rock having visibly crystalline texture.
sentences.translation: 深成火成岩石，有明显的晶体纹理。

sentences.sentence: This belt is bounded on the north by a group of large plutonic masses.
sentences.translation: 该带的北部被一群大规模的深成岩体所限。
